text:
Went for Tuina , the lady was professional and skilful, although you would always raw and painful when she knead on the right point, but that will effectively help to loosen the blockage that brings illness, release tense of muscle, or help in heeling sprain/muscle injury
If you go for Tuina, Guasha and cupping are free .
Very effective and friendly chinese physician for bone,  muscle, or injuries management.

I recently injured the sole of my foot while playing badminton, so I went to Rongtai Traditional Chinese Medicine Clinic for treatment on the recommendation of my mother. I didn't make a reservation in advance and went directly to the 1st floor. The receptionist told me that the reservations were full for the day, but suggested that I try to go to the 2nd floor to see if there is any space.

I took the elevator to the second floor and was welcomed by Xiaoyu, a very enthusiastic Chinese medicine practitioner. Together with another Chinese medicine practitioner, she carefully examined the soles of my feet and recommended a massage treatment and herbal dressings for the soles of my feet.

Sister Yu's massage is very good! I could feel her strong pressure on my injured area, and then she did fire therapy, which felt very warm and soothing. After 30 minutes of treatment, she applied a thick herbal ointment on me and carefully bandaged the soles of my feet.

I have made an appointment for a follow-up appointment tomorrow and hope to recover as soon as possible before traveling abroad.

Thank you very much for Sister Yuâ€™s professional treatment! Highly recommend Rongtai Traditional Chinese Medicine Clinic, a trustworthy traditional Chinese medicine treatment center.
